channel.title: How to edit ip's in client and source
channel.description:
Hey, I was just wondering how you should edit the ip's in your source and client.
What should i edit in the client?
What should i edit in the source? _____________________________________________
Also Im wondering how you get a client that your players download to play on the server. Like do you just give them your client or something? _____________________________________________
Best regards,
Kletzi101

item.title: How to edit ip's in client and source
item.dc:creator: @tyler28852 tyler28852
item.description:
@tyler28852 wrote:

thinking that your using a 317.

1.open up your client folder.
2.look for the file name GUI.Java
3.scroll down a bit and you should find a server ip example is (server-ip.no-ip.biz, or 123.123.1.1)
4. change the ip to yours lol.

  1. right click on your client folder and click “add to archive” make it a winrar. upload to a site such ass uppit or mediafire.
    2.give the link to the players that want to download.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit ip's in client and source
